name: babysitter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 someone who takes care of your baby or child while you are out, usually by coming to your home, especially someone you pay to do this: I promised the babysitter that we'd be home by midnight.
US (UK childminder) a person whose job is to take care of other people's children in her or his own home: I dropped the kids off at the babysitter's.
